code: import{apiFetch}from"./client";/* -------- Visitors -------- */export function fetchVisitors(){return apiFetch("/api/visitors");}export function createVisitor(payload){return apiFetch("/api/visitors",{method:"POST",body:JSON.stringify(payload)});}export function markVisitorExit(id){return apiFetch("/api/visitors/".concat(id,"/exit"),{method:"PATCH"});}/* -------- Parcels -------- */export function fetchParcels(){return apiFetch("/api/parcels");}export function createParcel(payload){return apiFetch("/api/parcels",{method:"POST",body:JSON.stringify(payload)});}export function markParcelPickedUp(id){return apiFetch("/api/parcels/".concat(id,"/pickup"),{method:"PATCH"});}
